title: Ticket #6100: Local universe may not write events to global event log
description:
For the local universe, if the job ad doesn't define UserLog or DAGManNodesLog, then the starter won't write job events to the global event log. For most such jobs, the global event log will include the submit event (written by the schedd), but no other events.

Most event log writers use getPathToUserLog() to build the filenames of the per-job event logs. It includes a check for the EVENT_LOG config param. The starter does its own construction of the log filenames, which lacks a check for EVENT_LOG.
